entries.femaleVariant: Whaddup, Night City! How we feelin' today, 'cause I feel a-maaaa-zing!
Why's that you might ask? Well it just so happens your girl just got a prototype of Moore Technologies' latest beaut.
I had to wait for some nasty scars to heal 'fore I fired these up for the first time, but when I did... well, see for yourself.
Here we go... "Accept", "Accept", blah blah blah... OK, it's ready.
You guys recording? Sweet. Three... Two... One... Go!
Ho-hooooly shit! Did you get that?! Hahaha!
Now, I could go over all the fine-grain detes and specs, but I'm guessin' that little demo spoke for itself.

All this just shows that Moore Technologies' Hausstock-W implants are an excellent choice for security personnel, mercs and, of course, any ordinary Night Citizen struggling to get their pickled scop jars open. Heheheh...
And now the moment you've all been waiting for... That's right, a five out of five! See ya next time, and keep on chippin' in!
The Hausstock-W forearms were originally designed for the military, but they've just been approved for general circulation.
One thing I will say, though â€“ for an extra premium, Moore'll throw in some red-hot incendiary and stun modules for the Hausstock-W.
